title: Tag Definitions Configuration
description: Configuration for extracting tag definitions from ExifTool tag tables

source.description: Path to ExifTool source file (relative to repository root, e.g., 'third-party/exiftool/lib/Image/ExifTool/Exif.pm')

description.description: Overview of what these tag definitions contain

table.description: Name of the tag table to extract (e.g., 'Main')

frequency_threshold.description: Minimum frequency threshold for tag inclusion (0.0 to 1.0)

include_mainstream.description: Whether to include tags marked as mainstream regardless of frequency

groups.description: List of tag groups to include (e.g., ['EXIF', 'ExifIFD', 'IFD0'])
